Emerald Ring (Right Middle Finger, F)
Female01_Hands_ring_04_description
A ring embedded with a transparently green emerald stone worn on the middle finger of the right hand. (Mohs hardness of 8)[#Legal]
Une bague sertie d'une émeraude d'un vert transparent portée au majeur de la main droite. (8 sur l'échelle de dureté de Mohs)[#Legal]
Ein Ring mit einem eingefassten, durchsichtig grünen Smaragd, der am Mittelfinger der rechten Hand getragen wird. (Mohshärte 8)[#Legal]
Anello con uno smeraldo verde trasparente incastonato, da portare al dito medio della mano destra. (durezza scala di Mohs: 8)[#Legal]
Un anillo con una esmeralda verde transparente incrustada que se coloca en el dedo corazón de la mano derecha. (Dureza en escala de Mohs, 8).[#Legal]
右手の中指に輝く、透明感のある緑色をしたエメラルドの指輪。（モース硬度８）[#Legal]
오른손의 중지에서 아름답게 빛나는 투명한 녹색 에메랄드 반지.(모스 경도 8)[#Legal]
A transluscent green emerald ring glittering on the middle finger of the right hand. (Mohs hardness = 8)[#Legal]
戴在右手中指，充滿透明感的綠寶石戒指。（莫氏硬度8）[#Legal]
戴在右手中指，充滿透明感的綠寶石戒指。（莫氏硬度8）[#Legal]
A ring embedded with a transparently green emerald stone worn on the middle finger of the right hand. (Mohs hardness of 8)[#Legal]
